Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: Ah a place to call my own. The scent of ink and paper, @. That's the scent of home.$1#$b#But it wouldn't be a real home without you, my love.$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I love the smell of a rainy day, it's like the sky is kissing the earth.$1#$b#What? I can romanticise the weather if I wish, @.$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Today seems like a good day to finish my revisions on 'Mysteries of the Dwarves'.#$b#Stay safe out there, @. I love you.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Is there anything you'd like me to do around the house, @? It helps my brain work if my hands are busy.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: The latest 'research' from Peasbody has been published.#$b#I shouldn't read it, I know... But...$5
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Oh, this weather makes my leg itch something fiendish.#$b#Sorry, I'm afraid I may not be up for much today.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Jasper: Time to work my way through some of this reading pile.$3#$b#Stay safe today, my love, and make sure to wear a coat.$1
Entries.patio_Jasper: Sometimes I like to close my eyes, breath in deep, and just clear my thoughts.#$b#It is then that I hear them, @. The birds in the trees, the insects buzzing around.#$b#I become a part of nature.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening gorgeous. Oh, you're soaked through!#$b#Please take care of yourself. I do not wish for you to get sick.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: My writing was not working, thus I tried my hand at cooking.[236]#$b#It's not exactly gourmet fare, I'm afraid, but it should warm you up.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh the gall of some people!#$b#Sorry, my love. I am not mad at you! I delved into the latest research of Professor Peasbody and oh... his proposals are still preposterous!^Sorry, my love. I am not mad at you! I delved into the latest research of Professor Peasbody and oh... her proposals are still preposterous!
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Oh my dear, you are soaked! Come here, let me help you out of those wet clothes.$2#$b#No, this isn't an excuse to... well...maybe it is...$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Please, let me take your coat. Tonight feels like a good night for curling up together and telling stories, don't you think?#$b#Or yes, perhaps other things too.$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: Ah, the sound of rain on the roof, my favorite person beside me...#$b#What more could I ever ask for?
Entries.Rainy_Night_Jasper: There has been a most insistent dripping all day, my love.#$b#I fear we may have acquired a leak. I shall check in the morning.$2
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning my dear! Please be careful out there.[195]#$b#I may not be much of a chef, but I can scramble a decently fluffy egg!
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: I failed to sleep last night - too many ideas buzzing in my head, thus I'll be living on this concoction today.[253]
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: You've really brought %farm back to life, @. I used to visit here: a scrawny kid with a pocket full of rocks.#$b#Your grandfather was always kind to me. He'd be proud of what you've done.$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Hmm... How should I spend today? Writing? Perhaps a little light reading?#$b#Oh, and I suppose I can find some time in my busy schedule to fit in some housework too, my love.$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: You tend to what needs to be tended out there, and I shall hold the fort! %pet and I against an army of dust bunnies!$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_Jasper: You know, my love, I am rather enjoying being a house spouse.$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Come here my love, curl with me by the fire. Would you like to hear a tale?$4#$b#Of the goblins? Or would you rather learn of my 'wild and reckless' student days?$1#$b#Oh, the pranks Cameron lured me into!$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: They say 'diamonds are a girl's best friend', but can diamonds hold a scintilating conversation?[72]$4#$b#A gift for you. Please don't love it more than you love me!$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: My apologies, I did not get much done today. I have been unravelling some complex theories.#$b#Oh, I do not wish to bore you with the details, my love.$2#$b#You wish to be bored? Very well then!$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Spent the day procrastinating... Oh, I meant cleaning.$1#$b#Everything should be dust free!$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Oh goodness! Is that the time? I was lost in my thoughts.#$b#Sorry, I didn't cook you dinner.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Jasper: I have just put the final touches on my latest research paper.$1#$b#Now to submit it, and hope...$2
Entries.Outdoor_0: Good morning! I took a quick stroll around before breakfast - Doctor's orders - everything seems in good order.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Ah, the fresh, clear air. I love it here, @. And am so grateful to be part of your life.
Entries.Outdoor_2: I caught a flash of color in the trees, down by the southern border. I do not think it was a bird.$1#$b#Dare I hope it was one of our junimo friends?$4
Entries.Outdoor_3: It is so peaceful here. I am not sure I could ever return to the bustle of the city.
Entries.Outdoor_4: I awoke at dawn, my mind too busy to permit sleep, and stepped out for a walk.#$b#I caught a glimpse of a dark figure in the fields. Do you think it was our subterranean friend, @?$1
Entries.funLeave_Jasper: I guess I'd better get some exercise. Doctor's orders! And I shall visit some friends.#$b#Have an excellent day, @. Remember, you rock!
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: Oh, that walk really took it out of me. I'm exhausted!#$b#I hope you had a more energetic day, @?
Entries.TwoKids_0: The kids certainly keep me on my toes! I taught them about volcanos.$1#$b#We made a slight mess in the kitchen...#$b#...and then I taught them all about cleaning up after themselves!$3
Entries.TwoKids_1: The kids and I had some fun in the garden today. I feel %kid1 might aspire to become an archeologist!#$b#%kid2, however, was more interested in excavating the contents of their nose...$2
Entries.TwoKids_2: %kid2 said 'geode' today! Or at least, that's what I like to think they said.#$b#It was probably just baby babble and wishful thinking, however.
Entries.TwoKids_3: The kids and I have been playing 'school'. I believe %kid1 is beginning to grasp the priciples of anthropology.$1#$b#%kid2, however, is currently classifying all the toys by flavor.$3
Entries.Good_1: Have I told you today that you're amazing?#$b#No? Well, that's awfully slack of me, I really need to up my game, don't I?$1#$b#@. You're amazing, and I love you.$4
Entries.Good_2: Ah good day my dear! Just wanted you to know that I ad-ORE you!$4#$b#Sorry. A bit of geology humor.$3
Entries.Good_4: Fresh air is good for the soul. And having you beside me, my dear, is an even better balm.$3#$b#I love you.$4
Entries.Good_5: Why yes, I have been borrowing Gunther's books. They have been most... inspirational.$4#$b#If you are home early tonight, perhaps we can both profit from my 'research'.$3
Entries.Good_6: Our home has become my haven, my dear. I truly now feel my heart is at ease.$1
Entries.Good_7: I may never reveal the secrets of the dwarves to the world, @, but I have found something - someone - better instead. You.$4#$b#Thank you for being amazing, and tolerating my foibles.$3
Entries.Good_8: You are my sun, my moon, my starlit sky...$1#$b#Well, yes, I did hear it in a movie, once, but it's true, regardless!$5
Entries.Good_9: I never thought I'd find the simple things so rewarding. Fresh food, a warm bed...#$b#and the most gorgeous man beside me.$3^And the most wonderful woman beside me.$3
Entries.Neutral_0: $p 5070124#Hmmm... I was just penning a letter to Cameron. Shall I give him your regards?$1^Hmmm... I was just penning a letter to Cameron. Shall I give her your regards?$1|I am a litle focused right now, working on my latest proposal.
Entries.Neutral_1: I fear I may have overdone it today... Perhaps tomorrow I should take things more easily.
Entries.Neutral_2: I am sorry my love, I'm a little busy right now... Jas asked me some rather thought-provoking questions, and I am formulating an appropriate response.
Entries.Neutral_3: $1 ZuCU_Tenure#I find myself missing my old lecturing days - how would you feel if I applied for a tenure at ZuCU?$2$k#$e#Another application for tenure declined.. I am afeared you are stuck with me, @.$3
Entries.Neutral_4: Today the ideas are flowing like water... Oh it is a joy, @, to be thus inspired!
Entries.Neutral_5: There is an ache deep in my bones, @. I fear age is beginning to creep in.
Entries.Neutral_6: I've been poring over the newspapers, @, and it appears petty theft is on the rise across the Valley.$2#$b#Perhaps it is merely hopeful optimism, but could it be connected to the dwarves?
Entries.Neutral_7: #$1 ZuCU_Submission#I have submitted another paper for consideration. I am hoping it shall help restore my reputation.$k#$e#I shall be recording some tutorials for the freshman classes at ZuCU, @! It is not the same as teaching, but at least I will not have to visit the city.
Entries.Neutral_8: I fear Vincent may love arthropods - well, arachnids - a little too much. I appear to have acquired a pet spider.$2
Entries.Neutral_9: ...so if the dwarves arrival disrupted the shadowfolk...That would explain...#$b#Oh, hello @. Sorry, I'm a little busy right now.
Entries.Bad_0: I fear I am beginning to suffer from cabin fever. My creativity is becoming stifled. Please, I need some space.
Entries.Bad_1: I sometimes wonder if I am your husband or your housekeeper. Please, @, I implore you - talk to me!$2
Entries.Bad_2: The spark that kindled between us has now flickered and died. I understand your reluctance to be bound to a broken old fool like myself.
Entries.Bad_3: Perhaps it is time I contacted Cameron again. At least he had time for me.$2^Perhaps it is time I contacted Cameron again. At least she had time for me.$2#$b#Even if it was to argue.
Entries.Bad_4: Even fierce debate is preferable to abject silence. I miss what we had, @. Please, give me a second chance.$2
Entries.Bad_5: Oh... now you have time for me? I shall join you in a minute, please let me finish up these notes.$2#$b#Yes, my work is important!$5
Entries.Bad_6: You know, the goblin chieftain tried to trick me into wedding his daughter.$2#$b#Perhaps she would've been a more agreeable match.$5
Entries.Bad_7: *sighs* I shall regret saying this, I'm sure, but the goblins made for better company.$5#$b#At least they talked to me occasionally...$2
Entries.Bad_8: Sometimes I wonder if you'd even notice if I never returned from the caves.$2#$b#I miss what we had, @. I believed you were The One.$2
Entries.Bad_9: ....Can't you see I'm busy? Oh, I don't look like I'm doing anything?$5#$b#Just leave me to my thoughts. Please, @.$2
Entries.spring_1: Spring has sprung! I'm sorry I can't help much on the farm, but I made you lunch.[240]
Entries.spring_8: I love watching the earth come back to life.
Entries.spring_12: I am looking forward to the Egg Festival tomorrow, @. 'Tis a time to celebrate renewal, and rebirth. As I myself feel reborn.$1
Entries.spring_13: Good morning Beloved! What glorious weather for a festival.$1
Entries.spring_23: Love is in the air, my dear, and there's a spring in my step.$3#$b#I hope you shall do the honor of dancing with me tomorrow.$1
Entries.spring_24: I've got my dancing shoes on and I'm ready to go! But, I'll understand if you choose a more sure-footed partner.#$b#But I do hope you'll dance with me.$4
Entries.summer_1: Summertime, a time to cherish the great outdoors.$1#$b#Please remember to wear a sunhat, my love.$4
Entries.summer_8: Sorry if I was restless last night... the heat makes it hard to sleep.$2
Entries.summer_15: My father was a jovial man. He always had time for me, even though he must have been exhausted and I was always full of questions.#$b#I can only hope that one day I shall be as good a father as he. I miss him so much, @.
Entries.summer_11: Oh, I am actually looking forward to the luau today, my love!$1#$b#With you by my side, I truly feel part of the community.$3
Entries.summer_28: Tonight our jellyfish visitors migrate past, headed for the warmer waters of the south.#$b#I shall meet you on the beach tonight, my love.$4
Entries.fall_1: Ah, the halcyon days of the harvest have arrived!#$b#Oh, I do love this autumn season. Autumn, such a beautiful word.$1
Entries.fall_22: My love! I am pondering how to celebrate my birthday this year.#$b#Oh, who am I kidding? I shall probably immerse myself in a book and forget all about it.$1#$b#I love you, and I shall see you tonight.$4
Entries.fall_15: I'm looking forward to the Fair tomorrow. I am certain your display will impress.#$b#Me? I shall catch up with Marlon and Clint. I enjoy their quiet company.$3
Entries.fall_16: Oh, such a glorious day for the fair! And it shall be a good to catch up with some old friends.$1
Entries.fall_26: When I was a child, I loved the Spirit's Eve festival. Now the thought of entering that maze gives me chills.#$b#I know it is all in fun, @. But...$2
Entries.winter_1: Oh, chilly isn't it, my love? Winter has cast her blanket across the land.$1
Entries.winter_7: Will you try your hand at the fishing contest tomorrow, my love?
Entries.winter_15: Ah yes, the travelers are in town! The perfect chance to indulge in some gift shopping.#$b#Who am I buying for? Oh, let's see... Gunther, Rasmodius... maybe Miss Penny...$3#$b#Oh there's someone I've forgotten? Now who could that be?$1
Entries.winter_25: Happy Winter Star my love. What am I thankful for? Oh, so many things!#$b#Friendships... a good book. And, of course, you my love. Happy Winter Star. I love you.[578 565 553 547 347]$4
Entries.winter_28: And so we bid farewell to another year, my love. What will the next year bring, do you think?[459]#$b#Adventure? New discoveries? Oh, I do not mind, as long as we are together.$4
Entries.summer_21: Beloved... I had the most terrible nightmare. I was alone, in the dark. I'm so filled with relief to see you.$2

Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: Just catching up on some correspondence, my dear.
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Oh, this summer rain is so hot and clammy. I feel I might have to stay inside today, and catch up on some reading.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: It's terribly wet out there, my love. I know it's warm, but please remember to wear a coat.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Did you know that the scent of rain on dry soil is called petrichor?#$b#It's an organic compound release by microbes, and arthropods love it too.$1#$b#Oh sorry, I didn't mean to give you a biology lesson - but nature is fascinating, isn't it?$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I received another rejection slip from an 'esteemed' college, @.#$b#Perhaps indeed it would be better to turn my hand to fiction.
Entries.patio_Jasper: It is a glorious day, is it not? Although perhaps I should have worn a hat...$1
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Ah my love, you're just in time. I've been watching that Queen of Sauce show and rustled up a little something.[234]$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I've been working on my memoirs, my dear.$1#$b#You know, I fancy there might be those that cannot decide if they are fact, or fiction.$3
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I do not think my mother ever recovered from my father's death, my love.#$b#He was a kind man, with a generous heart, and she was gentle and eloquent.#$b#I wish you could have met them, @. They would've loved you very much.#$b#Sorry, rainy nights make me sentimental.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Would you care to join me in bed, my love? I could read to you from my memoirs.$1#$b#Or, we could find some other way to enjoy each other's company?$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Here, let me help you get out of those wet clothes.$3#$b#What? No, I didn't mean it like that!$4#$b#Well, maybe just a little.$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning! I got up early to do some baking.[234]#$b#My mother and I used to bake together on sunday mornings.#$b#I must confess, the best part was 'cleaning up' the leftover batter!$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Today feels like a good day for some belated spring cleaning.#$b#Go forth and conquer, for I shall be your dedicated house husband.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: The nightmares still plague me, my love. It is easier, with you by my side.$3#$b#But I fear that I shall never be truly free.$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Something was scratching in the ceiling last night. I fear some birds have built themselves a nest.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Good evening, my love. I hope you don't mind the fragrance.#$b#I've been burning citronella candles to keep the bugs at bay.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Such a lovely warm evening. Perhaps we should take a blanket outside and study the stars.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Oh, my knee itches something terrible in this heat. I am happy to be mobile again but...$5#$b#Oh, sorry my love. I don't mean to moan.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: It so hot this evening. Here's a little something to cool you down.[233]
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: My father worked long hours, and came home black with coal dust.#$b#Yet he always managed to have time for my mother and I. He'd bring her trinkets too: flawed gemstones, interesting rocks.#$b#My friends all played with toy trucks and dolls... but I built worlds out of stones and shells.$3
Entries.Outdoor_1: I had trouble sleeping in the heat, so I came outside to greet the sunrise.#$b#It really is a beautiful farm.$1
Entries.Outdoor_0: Our little forest spirit friends have been visiting! They left us a gift on the doorstep.[402 259 398]
Entries.Outdoor_2: Good morning my love! I took a short walk around the farm, before the day heats up.$1#$b#Everything looks in good order.$3
Entries.Outdoor_3: Oh, my mind is alive with ideas, @! The tranquility here, oh it is such an inspiration.
Entries.Outdoor_4: I hope you don't mind, @, but I did a little excavating of the lower fields.#$b#I found this.#$b#It's kind of fun, isn't it? The people who used to live here must've really loved chickens.[113]
Entries.funLeave_Jasper: Time to stretch my legs and visit a few friends, @. Do you have any messages for Gunther?#$b#I might pick up a few books while I'm at it.
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: Oh, my arms ache from carrying so many books!#$e#$c 0.5#Gunther snuck in one of his favorites. I'm not really sure it's quite my genre, but I shall try it.$1
Entries.TwoKids_0: $1 TwoKids_Jasper#Don't you worry about us, @, the kids and I shall have a fine time!$k#$e#Maybe we could take the kids to the beach? Perhaps it's time to teach %kid1 the fine art of sand castle construction.
Entries.TwoKids_1: Giving %kid1 an ice cream was probably not the best idea...#$b#But don't worry, I cleaned all the walls!$3#$b#%kid1's quite the artist.
Entries.TwoKids_2: The children play so nicely together. I hope they always remain good friends.$4
Entries.TwoKids_3: The children drew you some pictures, @. %kid2 is experimenting with color.$1#$b#%kid1 drew you a chicken. Or possibly a crocodile. It's, err, rather stylised.$1

Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: Good morning gorgeous. I've been up since dawn, too inspired to sleep.$1#$b#Why is it that epiphanies always come in the wee small hours?
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Are you sure you must go out today, my love? We could do some baking, perhaps?#$b#I have been watching that Queen of Sauce show. She has proven most inspiring.$1
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: This autumn rain is rather dreary. Still, it sounds most musical on the roof.#$b#I feel today, perhaps, shall be a day to escape into a book.$3
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Please my love, keep dry amd warm. I would hate for you to catch a chill.$2
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: You are not going to the mines today, are you my love?#$b#Please, do take care. Here, this might help. [349]
Entries.patio_Jasper: The autumnal colors are so beautiful, and the temperature is perfect.$1#$b#I could stand here all day and soak up nature.$3
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening, my love! A little something to sweeten up your day.[611]$1#$b#Not that you aren't already sweet enough!$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I fear we have sprung a leak. I shall have to take a look at it tomorrow.$2
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: My love, you're freezing! Here, this'll warm you from the inside out.[236]$2#$b#Perhaps we could huddle beneath a blanket and read together?$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I heard rustling in the night. I believe this cooler nights are bringing the rodents inside.$2#$b#I hope %pet is up for the task before them.$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Good morning, @. I hope this shall be sufficient to help you through a busy day.[201 240 241 242]$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: My plans for today? Well, there's a new theory I'm pursuing...#$b#It won't make me famous, but it might help re-establish my career.$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I was thinking of my goblin friend today. Oh, not like that, do not fret, @!$2#$b#I wonder if she is chieftain now? She was always so curious about the outside world.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Today was... not a good day, my love. It feels heavy. Ominous.$2#$b#Please, will you come to bed with me? I take such comfort in your company.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: @, you're home! Is that the time? I was quite wrapped up in my research and lost track.$2#$b#Please forgive me, for I have not cooked you dinner.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Excellent news, @! My latest paper has been accepted for publication in {{random: Cryptozoology Today, Journal of Uncommon Theories, The Unorthodox}}.$1#$b#Yes, I know, not the prestigious publication I had hoped...but it's a beginning.$2#$b#And at least I know people read these!$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: The goblins celebrate Spirit's Eve too you know, but in a rather different manner to us!$3#$b#They tell the tales of their ancestors, with puppets woven from wood and fibre, and sing their praises on instruments made of bone.#$b#Spirit's Eve is about remembrance for them, not about hiding from the shadows.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Listen to the wind rattling the shutters and the boards that creak and moan...$2#$b#I am glad that you are here, @, to help me keep the shadows at bay.$4
Entries.Outdoor_1: When I was a kid, we would scramble over the cliffs, racing to fill our blackberry baskets.$3#$b#My mother was a wonderful baker; she made the most delicious pies.$1
Entries.Outdoor_0: The animals seem a little restless this morning. They can feel the chill in the air, the approach of winter.$2
Entries.Outdoor_2: The breeze is brisk this morning. Perhaps you should wear a coat?$2
Entries.Outdoor_3: Good morning @! Too many ideas, and roaming the farm, visiting the animals, it helps to clear my thoughts.#$b#Have a productive day, my love. I am sure I shall!$3
Entries.Outdoor_4: I could not sleep, @. I came out here, so as not to disturb you with my restlessness.#$b#Watching the sun rise over your farm... it is really most beautiful.#$b#Almost as beautiful as your smile.
Entries.funLeave_Jasper: I shall be visiting the library today, if you have any requests?
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: Oh @, the shadows lurk long, and the trees seem to whisper.$2#$b#I can sense the brush of the void. Winter is coming.$2
Entries.TwoKids_0: %kid1 found a worm in the leaves today and told %kid2 it was 'piz-getti'.$2#$b#Do not fret, it was confiscated and safely liberated. No worms - or small children! - harmed.$3
Entries.TwoKids_1: The kids and I have taken to painting rocks and hiding them around the village.#$b#Small steps, yes, but I shall make a geologist of at least one of them yet!
Entries.TwoKids_2: So much of my life I dedicated to research, but when I look at our beautiful family...#$b#I'm so glad you guided me down another path, @.

Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: These chilly mornings have awoken my inspiration! Today, paperwork. Tomorrow, the world!
Entries.patio_Jasper: There's a stillness to winter, as though Nature herself is pausing to draw breath.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Ah my love, it's too chilly to step outside. Want to join me in front of the fire?$1#$b#We could drink hot cocoa and huddle for warmth.$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Good morning my love. I do not think I shall be up for much today, I'm afraid.$2#$b#The cold is none too kind to these aging bones.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Today feels like a day for contemplation and gratitude. I am grateful to have you in my life, @.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Please wrap up warm, my love. I would hate for you to catch a chill.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: My love, you're freezing! Here, this'll warm you from the inside out.[236]$2#$b#Perhaps we could huddle beneath a blanket and read together?$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Brrr... it's going to be a frosty one tonight!#$b#Here's something to warm you up.[226]
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: The way the ice draws patterns on the glass is really quite magical, don't you think?#$b#You can appreciate how legends of Jack Frost and Old Man Winter came about.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: It's going to snow tonight. Do you think perhaps we might be snowed in?$2#$b#I can think of no other person I would rather be snowbound with.$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: My mother fought for years to have the authorities exhume the mines.$2#$b#She could not take it here anymore, and moved far away. I miss her... but I call her often.
Entries.Outdoor_1: I found footprints in the snow around the barn.#$b#I feel, perhaps, we have had a visitor.#$b#Goblin or Dwarf? I could not say.$3
Entries.Outdoor_0: I must confess, my love, it is rather satisfactory the way the snow crunches beneath one's feet.
Entries.Outdoor_2: I wonder where junimo go in winter? Do they hibernate? Or seek warmer habitations?#$b#Perhaps that's why they claim buildings we've forgotten.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Good morning my love. I awoke early, and swept the snow from the porch.#$b#I only wish I could clear the roof as well.
Entries.TwoKids_0: Is this snow in my hair? I suppose it is. %kid1 and %kid2 engaged in a rather instense snowball fight.#$b#Alas, I appear to have become caught in the crossfire.$1#$b#Perhaps tomorrow you might like to join us?$3
Entries.TwoKids_1: Apologies for all the glitter. Today was art and crafts day and well... it really does get everywhere, doesn't it?$1
Entries.TwoKids_2: %kid1 spent the day trying to catch snowflakes on their tongue.#$b#Whereas %kid2 merely tried to eat snow.$2#$b#Ah, children are such a delight!$1
Entries.TwoKids_3: We've been making snowflakes! Oh, out of paper my love. And do not fret, I'll clean up the mess!$1

Entries.{{AnniversarySeason}}_{{AnniversaryDayOf: Happy anniversary, @. A small token of my appreciation.[578 565 553 547 347]#$e#You have sparked new light inside me, and drawn me back to life.$3#$b#I love you.$4

$1 Jasper_Anniversary#Happy anniversary Beloved. Please, would you join me on the beach tonight? For I have a little something prepared in celebration.$4$k#$e#Happy anniversary, @. A small token of my appreciation.[578 565 553 547 347]#$e#You have sparked new light inside me, and drawn me back to life.$3#$b#I love you.$4

Entries.Resort_Entering: My love! What a surprise to see you here. I hope your tropical farm is doing well.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll see you soon my love. Perhaps I shall prepare something special for dinner.#$b#Or would you prefer ... dessert.$4
Entries.Resort_Shore: Oh, I found the most fascinating fossil in the sand. This really is a most remarkable island.
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: Would you care to join me in the shade?
Entries.Resort_Wander: You know, Professor Snail speaks of hearing strange rumblings coming from that mountain.#$b#A part of me wishes to explore it... to unearth its secrets.#$b#But the other part? The other part is still afraid.$2
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus, please, one of your delicious cocktails for my husband.^Gus, please, one of your delicious cocktails for my wife.#$b#What would you like? My love? Gus shakes a most refreshing pina colada.$1

Entries.winter_8: I'm not sure who's more excited about the Ice Festival today, the kids or me!$1#$b#I promised %kid1 we'd make a snowman. But I think %kid2 would prefer a snowball fight...$2

Entries.GILeave_Jasper: Oh Beloved, I feel a trip to Ginger Island is in order today.$1#$b#Perhaps I shall find some new evidence for my theories. It truly is a remarkable place.
Entries.GIReturn_Jasper: I have had a most splendid day, my love.#$b#Oh, but you must have been working hard. Would you like me to help you relax?$4
Entries.GIReturn_Talked_Jasper: I hope your trip to the island was as lucrative as mine, beloved. Here, I brought you home a little something.$1 [791 827 852 848]
